titleInfo.title: What can we learn from the discussion of personality questionnaires for the construction of temperament inventories?
Explorations in temperament: international perspectives on theory and measurement

bibliographicCitation.ieee: A. Angleitner and R. Riemann, “What can we learn from the discussion of personality questionnaires for the construction of temperament inventories?”, Explorations in temperament: international perspectives on theory and measurement, J. Strelau, ed., Perspectives on individual differences, New York, NY: Plenum Press, 1991, pp.191-204.
